actions.text: Amendment SA 3543 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 74. Record Vote Number: 171.

Amendment SA 3543 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5347-5352; text: CR S5347) To reduce the amounts appropriated to comply with the spending limits under the Budget Control Act of 2011.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3543 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 74. Record Vote Number: 171.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3543 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3399.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3543 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 74. Record Vote Number: 171.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To reduce the amounts appropriated to comply with the spending limits under the Budget Control Act of 2011.
